name: Inspire-Inator
description:
Made in 48 hours for JimJam.

This is a game related to some Greatly Inspiring Poeple. There are 4 Levels. Each level Focusing aon One Person. Find the Inspiring Person, pick up them with your car, Drop of at where they want to go. 

The car uses Inspiration as Fuel. be sure to do your task before your Inspiration runs out. Also Don't fall from the Inspiring world. There is no way back. (You need to restart the game).
